item.title: Version 0.9.0
item.description:
SupaSidebar 0.9.0

Whatâ€™s New

  • Smart Folders: Automatically organize links using custom filters. Filter by date, domain, URL pattern, type, or spaces to keep everything organized without manual sorting. Create them using the plus button in the sidebar footer.
  • Default Sidebar Position: Choose whether the sidebar opens on the left or right side by default to match your preferred workflow.
  • Manual Link Creation: Add new links directly from the sidebar footer using the plus button instead of relying only on keyboard shortcuts.
  • Wavebox browser support

Minor Changes

  • Better Rename Flow: Renaming items now automatically selects the text and focuses the input field for faster editing.
  • Quick Move to Folder: Move items to folders using right-click or the 3-dot context menu.
  • Performance Improvements: Various optimizations throughout the app.

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed folders collapsing unexpectedly when renaming items.
  • Fixed rename functionality being blocked by hover interactions.
  • Fixed browser button breaking layout after 3rd layer of nested folders.
  • Fixed scrolling lag when opening nested folders.
